alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 07 at 3:22AM CDT until August 07 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves 4 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Milwaukee County. * WHEN...From 7 AM CDT today through this evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include Bayview Beach in Milwaukee... Big Bay Beach in the Village of Whitefish Bay... Mckinley Beach in Milwaukee... Bender Beach in Oak Creek...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
